thread.title: ‘Logan’ Trailer: Hugh Jackman Risks It All in Final Wolverine Film
thread.title_full: ‘Logan’ Trailer: Hugh Jackman Risks It All in Final Wolverine Film

author: Liz Calvario
title: ‘Logan’ Trailer: Hugh Jackman Risks It All in Final Wolverine Film
text: Talk 20th Century Fox After 17 years, Hugh Jackman ’s legacy as Wolverine is coming to an end in the upcoming R-rated film “ Logan .” Reprising his role of the sulky X-Man for the ninth and final time, 20th Century Fox has released a new trailer ahead of its March release. Set in the future, the film follows a weary Logan as he cares for an ailing Professor X ( Patrick Stewart ) in a hide out on the Mexican border. As Wolverine tries to hide from the world and his X-Man legacy, he meets a young mutant, Laura Kinney (Sienna Novikov), who is being pursued by dark forces. “Logan” is directed by James Mangold and co-stars Boyd Holbrook, Doris Morgado and Richard E. Grant. READ MORE: ‘Logan’ Trailer: Hugh Jackman’s Final Wolverine Movie Mixes The Superhero Genre With The Western Before its theatrical release, the film is set to have its world premiere at the Berlin International Film Festival, taking place February 9 to 19. Over the past weeks, Jackman and Mangold have been hyping fans up by sharing postcards and new images from the feature, some of which you can see below. “Logan” arrives in theaters on March 3. Taken w/ LEICA SL 35mm, ISO 1600 1/200 ƒ1.4 — photo by JM pic.twitter.com/T5xUFCQo2g
